title: Taming Justice
description: Deadly games with dangerous men are my only hope.The Miami Knives, the city’s most dangerous criminals, have stolen my best friend. And I’m going to get her back.Growing up on the streets of the city has taught me everything I need to know. I’m no princess, and there’s no knight in shining armor to save the day.When I find myself captured by the very men I was hoping to destroy, I’ll have to play their games. Suddenly, I don’t just have to save her. I have to save myself, too.But I know them. Hell, I dated the ringleader, and there may still be a spark between us.That doesn’t change anything. Every day will be a fight to survive. Every day, I’ll walk that razor’s edge between life and death.If I don’t outwit the Knives, I’m as good as dead. Or maybe something even worse.Killing Eve meets Sons of Anarchy in this dark romance reverse harem. This is a dark book which is only suitable for 18+ readers and contains content that some readers might find triggering.
author: Clarissa Bright
